ProjectTitle: Targeting the metabolism of lung resident cells to inhibit metastasis formation
InitialFeedbackHistory: 14/02/2025 [REDACTED] used an older DMP template, please convert your DMP to the [REDACTED] standard DMP template, you can find this template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/. [REDACTED] recommend converting this at your earliest convenience and submitting as intermediate DMP, but please make sure that the final DMP that FWO will ask you to submit at the end of the project follows the new template [REDACTED] you indicate using OneDrive for storage during the project, the ICTS however recommends not to use OneDrive for research data, you also mention the L drive which is a good solution, can you use this for all the data? [REDACTED] not please consult the storage guide for solutions recommended by ICTS: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] please note that the minimum preservation time of 5 years is the FWO guideline, the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy requires a 10-year preservation period for all relevant data. [REDACTED] more details see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
label: good with suggestions
